Links

In collaboration with the Andelfinger lab we generated a heart mouse maturation atlas from 14.5 to adult stages, which is freely available for exploration.

We are part of the Department of Congenital Heart Disease and Pediatric Cardiology, the Institute for Human Genetics at the UKSH Campus Kiel and the Christian-Albrechts-University Kiel.
